content:
1. Visit Pench National Park for wildlife safari.
2. Visit Deekshabhoomi and experience the Buddhist culture.
3. Visit Sitabuldi Fort for a glimpse of history.
4. Visit Maharajbagh Zoo to explore the animal kingdom.
5. Visit Ambazari Lake and Garden for a picnic.
6. Visit Empress Mall for shopping and a movie experience.
7. Visit Ramtek Fort and Temple for a spiritual experience.
8. Visit Balaji Mandir for a holy experience.
9. Visit Futala Lake and enjoy the serene view.
10. Visit Raman Science Centre for science exhibitions and shows.
